710177f-a.title: Manhattan: 8th Avenue - 41st Street
710177f-a.text:

Ame ican Theatre before its demolition.
June 4, 1933.
P. L. Sperr.

april 30, 1934.

May 27, 1929.

731319f-a.title: Celebrations - Parades - Municipal events - W.P.A. [Works Progress Administration] Parade.
731319f-a.text:
(1)
W.P.A., Parade, from Madison Square (23rd Street and Fifth Ave)., to Madison Square Garden (50th Street and Eighth Ave). View taken southward on Eighth Ave., at West 41st Street.
January 9, 1937.
Geo. D. Chinn.
(2)
The same, north on Eighth Ave., at Wast 41st Street. "A lull in the mard"
January 9, 1937.
Geo. D. Chinn.
